sentences.en: We shall be burnt to a cinder; we were baked through long ago.
sentences.cn: 我们将被烧成灰烬；我们很久以前就被烤透了。

sentences.en: "We shall be burnt to a cinder; we were baked through long ago," cried the loaves as before.
sentences.cn: “我们将被烧成灰烬；我们早就烤得熟透了。”面包像以前一样叫道。

sentences.en: Dummling answered: "I have only cinder-cake and sour beer; if that pleases you, we will sit down and eat."
sentences.cn: 小傻瓜回答说：“我只有炉灰烤饼和酸啤酒；如果你愿意的话，我们可以坐下来吃。”
